mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_board (team_id, user_id, type, title, content, created_at) VALUES (#{teamId}, #{userId}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT tb.*, m.nickname AS writerNickname FROM team_board tb JOIN member m ON tb.user_id = m.user_id WHERE tb.team_id = #{teamId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN tb.type = 'NOTICE' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ASC, tb.created_at DESC
